Comments_List: Techniques for classical and statistical thermodynamics.
General overview of thermodynamics with a focus on deriving the fundamental equations of thermodynamic systems
I learned some neat Calculus tricks I had not known from my Calculus courses.
Rushed due to it being a summer course, but that is expected. Could be improved by having class every day in the week in order to allow for catch up time.
The way the course was laid out was perfect for the summer. Low stakes psets allowed us to focus on the method of solving problems and created more learning opportunities.
Yes, great and enjoyable class that will allow me to get credit at my home university.
You probably have to take this class for your major. I would definitely recommend taking with Loewenberg.
Yes, but the course should not be taken during the summer, as it deserves to be given more time by the students instead of just five weeks.
